text: E! has given a fourth season greenlight to its hit series Total Bellas. The renewal comes as the series, which follows the lives of WWE superstars Nikki Bella and Brie Bella, finished its third season with its best numbers to date. Season 3 was its highest - rated season ever among all key demos, drawing nearly 1 million total viewers per episode, up 22 % from the previous season among the core P18 - 49 demographic, according to the network and Nielsen. Sunday night premieres of Total Bellas ranked among the Top 10 programs in primetime across ad - supported cable with W18 - 34 and W18 - 49.
